meanings.sent1: The rules were left unwritten, causing confusion among the players.
meanings.sent2: She found an unwritten note on her desk, reminding her of the meeting.
meanings.sent3: The unwritten message on the board made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: His unwritten promise to always be there for her was like a silent bond between them.
meanings.sent5: The unwritten law of the jungle was to always watch out for each other.

meanings.definition: Existing or occurring without being formally established or documented.
meanings.sent1: Their unwritten agreement to share the chores worked well for both of them.
meanings.sent2: The unwritten history of the ancient civilization fascinated the archaeologists.
meanings.sent3: The unwritten rule of always wearing a hat indoors puzzled the guests.
meanings.sent4: The unwritten bond between the siblings was stronger than any legal document.
meanings.sent5: The unwritten tradition of passing down the family recipe brought them closer together.
